title: 1. This Order may be cited as the Appointment of Special Adviser (Minister
heading: 1. This Order may be cited as the Appointment of Special Adviser (Minister
text_raw:
1. This Order may be cited as the Appointment of Special Adviser (Minister 
of State at the Department of the Taoiseach, the Department of Foreign Affairs 
and Trade and the Department of Defence) Order 2025.
text_norm: 1 order may cited appointment special adviser (minister state department taoiseach department foreign affair trade department defence) order 2025

title: 1. This Order may be cited as the Appointment of Special Adviser (Minister
heading: 2. Daniel Griffin, particulars of whose address have been deposited at the
text_raw:
2. Daniel Griffin, particulars of whose address have been deposited at the 
offices of the Department of the Taoiseach, is appointed to be a Special Adviser 
to Thomas Byrne, Minister of State at the Department of Taoiseach, with effect 
from 29 January 2025.
text_norm: 2 daniel griffin particular whose address deposited office department taoiseach appointed special adviser thomas byrne minister state department taoiseach effect 29 january 2025

title: 1. This Order may be cited as the Appointment of Special Adviser (Minister
heading: 3. Daniel Griffin, particulars of whose address have been deposited at the
text_raw:
3. Daniel Griffin, particulars of whose address have been deposited at the 
offices of the Department of Foreign Affairs and Trade, is appointed to be a 
Special Adviser to Thomas Byrne, Minister of State at the Department of Foreign 
Affairs and Trade, with effect from 29 January 2025.
text_norm: 3 daniel griffin particular whose address deposited office department foreign affair trade appointed special adviser thomas byrne minister state department foreign affair trade effect 29 january 2025

title: 1. This Order may be cited as the Appointment of Special Adviser (Minister
heading: 4. Daniel Griffin, particulars of whose address have been deposited at the
text_raw:
4. Daniel Griffin, particulars of whose address have been deposited at the 
offices of the Department of Defence, is appointed to be a Special Adviser to 
Thomas Byrne, Minister of State at the Department of Defence with effect from 
29 January 2025. 

GIVEN under the Official Seal of the Government, 

10 June, 2025. 

MICHEAL MARTIN, 

Taoiseach. 

Notice of the making of this Statutory Instrument was published in 
"Iris Oifigiúil" of 13th June, 2025. 

 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 [336] 3
